sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_48edde30db5ce010f61cb298f4961917
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco Software Lifecycle TM">64229911db482010c81a7b82399619d1</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {
	/*var logger = new Cisco_BCS_SNLogger();
	var daoScript = new Cisco_DAOScript();
	try{
		logger.debug("Inside software EOX Transform map.");
		var deviceid = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("devices","device_id",target.device_id);
		target.device_id_ref = deviceid;

		var sweoxid = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("softwareLifecycleBulletin","sw_eox_id",target.sw_id);
		target.sw_id_ref = sweoxid;
		target.update();

	}catch(e) {
		logger.error("Exception caught inside software EOX Transform map. Error : - " + e);
	}*/

	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();
	// Devices
	var resultDevices = dao.createReferences(target.device_id, "device_id", "sweox", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_devices", true);
	if(resultDevices){
		target.device_id_ref = resultDevices + "";
		target.update();
	}

	//SWEox Bulletin
	var resultSwEoxBulletin = dao.createReferences(target.sw_id, "sw_eox_id", "", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_sw_eox_bulletins", false);
	if(resultSwEoxBulletin){
		target.sw_id_ref = resultSwEoxBulletin + "";
		target.update();
	}

	calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_software_lifecycle","","sw_id=" + target.sw_id + "");
	dao.updateCalculatedField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_sw_eox_bulletins","sw_eox_id="+target.sw_id+"","devices",calculatedFieldValue);

	// 	target.update();

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harsh.gupta</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-03 09:09:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>48edde30db5ce010f61cb298f4961917</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_48edde30db5ce010f61cb298f4961917</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-16 13:06:48</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
